long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GTA 6 News Hub Extension: Your Ultimate Source for GTA 6 Updates!

Stay ahead of the game with the GTA 6 News Hub Extension! This powerful tool provides you with the latest information on the highly anticipated release of GTA 6, including a countdown to the official launch date.

Features:

New Tab with Search and Shortcuts: Enhance your browsing experience with a customizable new tab page that includes quick access to your favorite sites and a search bar for easy web navigation.

Release Date Countdown: Keep track of the remaining days until GTA 6 hits the shelves! Our countdown timer ensures you never miss an update as the release date approaches.

Character List: Discover in-depth profiles of all the characters featured in GTA 6. Learn about their backstories, relationships, and roles in the game, giving you a deeper understanding of the storyline.

Stay informed and excited about the upcoming release of GTA 6 with the GTA 6 News Hub Extension. Get ready to dive into the world of Vice City like never before!
